topic.title: DocBook PDF (Show Change Tracking and Comments)

keywords.indexterm: Transformation ScenariosShow Change Tracking and Comments
Show change tracking/comments in DocBook PDF

body.p: includes a built-in transformation scenario that is designed to show tracked changes and comment in DocBook to PDF output.
To include comments and tracked changes (stored within your DocBook 5 documents) in the PDF output, follow these steps:

ol.li: Click the Configure Transformation Scenario(s) button.
Select DocBook PDF (Show Change Tracking and Comments) in the DocBook 5 section.
If you need to configure the transformation, click the Edit or Duplicate button, make your changes to the scenario, and click OK.
Click the Apply Associated button to run the transformation scenario.

body.p: Result: Comment threads and tracked changes will now appear in the PDF output. Details about each comment or change will be available in the footer section for each page.
